branchCategory.name: Valves (All Types)
branchCategory.description: Series VPA4 is a 5 port air operated valve with a rubber seal.  The series is available with or without a sub-plate.  Applicable thread types include Rc, G, NPT, NPTF

branchItem.name: VPA4*50/4*70, 5 Port Air Operated Valve
branchItem.description: Series VPA4 is a 5 port air operated valve with a rubber seal.  The series is available with or without a sub-plate.  Applicable thread types include Rc, G, NPT, NPTF
